meanings.definition: A person who organizes and operates a business or businesses, taking on greater than normal financial risks in order to do so.
meanings.sent1: Many entrepreneurs start their own companies to pursue their dreams.
meanings.sent2: Entrepreneurs play a crucial role in driving economic growth.
meanings.sent3: The group of entrepreneurs decided to open a bakery in space - talk about out of this world pastries!
meanings.sent4: She was a fearless entrepreneur, navigating the stormy seas of business.
meanings.sent5: The image of the entrepreneur, with a briefcase in hand, symbolizes ambition and determination.

meanings.definition: A person who starts a business and is willing to risk loss in order to make money.
meanings.sent1: The young entrepreneur invested all her savings into her startup.
meanings.sent2: Entrepreneurs need to carefully assess market risks before launching a new venture.
meanings.sent3: The entrepreneur's attempt to sell ice to penguins was met with icy stares.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, entrepreneurs are the brave pioneers forging new paths.
meanings.sent5: The entrepreneur's journey from idea to profit is a rollercoaster of emotions and challenges.

meanings.definition: A person who organizes and manages any enterprise, especially a business, usually with considerable initiative and risk.
meanings.sent1: Successful entrepreneurs are always looking for innovative ways to grow their businesses.
meanings.sent2: Entrepreneurs must be adaptable to changing market conditions to stay competitive.
meanings.sent3: The group of entrepreneurs decided to start a lemonade stand in the middle of a snowstorm - talk about thinking outside the box!
meanings.sent4: She was a visionary entrepreneur, seeing opportunities where others saw obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The entrepreneur's spirit of perseverance and resilience is truly inspiring.
